channel.title: [718/748] RuneScape DemonWars v3 -Reboot-
channel.description:
[center]Greetings I am DemonWars.
I have returned from the retched abyss known as life, and i have come to enlighten you mortal scum with a new artwork of mine. I have chosen the Matrix 718 Loading 748 to be the cloth on which i will brush the paint of enlightment on. The source i am using will be Rune-Evolution 748, and i will be writing the storyline myself. I have chosen this source for it's near perfect combat, in both melee and magic. I am yet to convert some of my old masterpieces of coding to the new format.
IF. One of you mortals has something to desire from my works, leave it in the comments down below. I will consider it.
King's regards. DemonWars.[/center]

item.title: [718/748] RuneScape DemonWars v3 -Reboot-
item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

arham 4:

Olook you’re back.

Yes, i do want to apologize for my absence last three years.
I have had a quite busy life, Things have cleared a bit and i’m ready to get back.
I realise that i have got some people’s hopes up and have dissapointed them, but i promised a V3 release, and i will make it one of my own.

EDIT: Last week, two of my elders have passed away, the development has been slowed down a slight bit.
I will do a update in three days.

Read full topic

item.title: [718/748] RuneScape DemonWars v3 -Reboot-

I will post some pictures as soon as i have enough
